description:
Amaaki, Haruaki`s twin brother, takes his place and becomes a teacher for a day. Soon after, Yanagida`s love potion cause havoc at the school. And to finish the episode off, the whole class goes to a public bath.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Amaaki, Momoyama-san, and the Nudity Festival
雨明と桃山さんと裸祭
